resources.string: John is a former swim instructor turned coder, he loves eating and thinking about eating. He is currently enrolled at Pursuit, a highly competitive programming school with an acceptance rate of 10%. He enjoys long walks on the beach and videos of cats and dogs being bros. Thanos did nothing wrong, donâ€™t \@ me

Evelyn was born and raised in Queens (fyi, the birthplace of the Ramones). Growing up, she never once considered a career in the tech industry but all that has changed in the past couple of months. Evelyn is so excited to be an Android Fellow at Pursuit, learning new things every day. She looks forward to what the future will bring and how she can contribute to the tech industry in meaningful, positive and unique way.

riverrun, past Eve and Adam\'s, from swerve of shore to bend of bay, brings us by a commodius vicus of recirculation back to Howth Castle and Environs. Sir Tristram, violer d\'amores, fr\'over the short sea, had passen- core rearrived from North Armorica on this side the scraggy isthmus of Europe Minor to wielderfight his penisolate war: nor had topsawyer\'s rocks by the stream Oconee exaggerated themselse to Laurens County\'s gorgios while they went doublin their mumper all the time: nor avoice from afire bellowsed mishe mishe to tauftauf thuartpeatrick: not yet, though venissoon after,
Welcome! This app will introduce you to three of the most eager Android developers at Pursuit. Feel free to check out their \ngithub projects!
There are no email clients installed.
